author: maxb
msg: Improvements to the direct-access BDB repository structure tools.
* skel.py: Add default initializer values to all the types of skel objects.
Represent svndiff windows as a class, not a fragment of skel structure.
* svn-bdb-view.py: Adapt to the changed representation of windows, fixing some
bugs due to the obscurity of the previous interface.

author: lundblad
msg: In ra_local, and ra_svn, support paths inside the repository containing
characters not supported by the OS native character encoding.
* libsvn_repos/repos.c (svn_repos_find_root_path): Try to convert the path
from UTF-8 before checking if it is the repository path in each iteration.
(find_repos): Don't use APR to merge repo path with server root.

author: lundblad
msg: Store URI escaping and validation tables more compactly.
* libsvn_subr/path.c (uri_escape): Change table arg to array of char instead
from array of int to array of char.

author: ghudson
msg: * STATUS: Nominate and vote for r10616.
